CS:GO is the game that never dies for me. You may quit it for some time but the pleasure of playing it always come back. Sure, there are some issues but in the end, it's the most polished competitive FPS game out there. 
From my experience, there is not as many cheaters as some people claim. So play the game and have fun :) !

Really good game,
It's a difficult game, not like any other fps.
There a lot of tactics in this game and mechanics. Movement systems / Weapons systems / Team Play.
It takes a while to fully understand the game, Most fun to play with friends. Solo is also possible.

The game is not heavy at all, so a potato can run it ;)
